arts.ttl: Brentford v Chelsea: Premier League – live
arts.sum: Match at Gtech Community Stadium starts at 8pm (BST) Transfer window: Premier League club-by-club analysis Share your thoughts with Xaymaca via email 5 min: Brentford have the first real chance of the game. It’s route one stuff: a long ball over the top finds Kevin Schade who take the ball down before cutting in and letting fly. The shot takes a deflection and is out for a corner. 2 min: Chelsea are setting the tempo early in this game. It’s good to see Wesley Fofana back after a series of injuries. It’s strange to see him at right back though, especially with Reece James and Malo Gusto on the bench. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Confirmed Chelsea line up vs Brentford
arts.sum: Chelsea: Sanchez, Fofana, Chalobah, Tosin, Hato, Caicedo, Fernandez (c), Neto, Buonanotte, Gittens, Joao Pedro Jorrel Hato comes into the team for Marc Cucurella to make his first start, while Wesley Fofana is back in the line-up following injury, replacing Malo Gusto .
Follow Saturday's west London derby with the best facts and live Opta data in our Brentford vs Chelsea stats page. The post Brentford vs Chelsea Stats: LIVE appeared first on Opta Analyst.

arts.ttl: Brentford v Chelsea line-ups: Palmer a sub, Fofana starts, Bees without Damsgaard
arts.sum: Cole Palmer is on the bench for Chelsea for tonight’s west London derby, while the fit-again Wesley Fofana makes his first Premier League start since March. Palmer has been struggling with a groin injury but is fit enough to return to the Blues squad.
